byline.contributor: Jeremy Bowers contributed reporting from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.

abstract: Donald Trump pledges to end controversial H-1B visa program without exceptions, despite fact his own companies, including Trump Modeling Management, have used program to bring hundreds of foreign workers into United States for years.

headline.print_headline: Trump Wants to Cut Visas He Used for His Own Models
headline.main: Donald Trump Wants to Cut Visa Program He Used for His Own Models

snippet: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management.
